member.name: T:Cooking.WPF.Commands.AsyncDelegateCommand
member.summary: ICommand implementation which force execution on separate thread.

member.name: M:Cooking.WPF.Commands.AsyncDelegateCommand.#ctor(System.Func{System.Threading.Tasks.Task},System.Func{System.Boolean},System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Function to execute on separate thread.
Function to determine if can be executed.
Execute function only once, after that would return false regardless.
UI not blocked when function executed, so user can trigger function multiple times at once. This will prevent it: during execution would return false.

member.summary: ICommand implementation for WPF bindings.

member.summary: ICommand implementation which force execution on separate thread. Takes arbitrary paremeter as input.

Function to determine if can be executed.
Execute function only once, after that would return false regardless.

member.summary: Convert LastCooked value to localized string.

member.name: T:Cooking.WPF.Converters.MultiplyConverter
member.summary: Converter which returns multiplication of its parameters. All of the parameters must be convertable to double (e.g. int, double, float, etc.).

member.name: T:Cooking.WPF.Converters.NullImageConverter
member.summary: https://stackoverflow.com/a/5628347.

member.name: T:Cooking.WPF.Converters.RatingConverter
member.summary:
control-specific controller Returns current brush for a column
Accepts 3 values: current column index, rating value and rating preview value
If rating preview is not null and it's value greater or equals to column index (mouse is over one of columns to the right) - returns PreviewBrush If rating preview is null and rating value greater or equals to column index - returns OnBrush Otherwise returs OffBrush.

member.name: P:Cooking.WPF.Converters.RatingConverter.PreviewBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets brush that will be used for values which is about to be selected on MouseOver.

member.name: P:Cooking.WPF.Converters.RatingConverter.OnBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets brush that will be used for selected values.

member.name: P:Cooking.WPF.Converters.RatingConverter.OffBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets brush that will be used for not selected values.
